alert.note: Alert for Hunt; Kaufman; Rockwall; Van Zandt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 16 at 6:24PM CDT until March 16 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR ROCKWALL...SOUTHWESTERN HUNT...KAUFMAN...NORTHWESTERN VAN ZANDT AND SOUTHEASTERN DALLAS COUNTIES... At 624 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Talty, or near Terrell, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 65 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Dallas, Garland, Mesquite, Rowlett, Rockwall, Lancaster, Greenville, Balch Springs, Terrell, Seagoville, Forney, Kaufman, Hutchins, Wills Point, Royse City, Heath, Fate, Sunnyvale, Wilmer and Crandall. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...65 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central Texas. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for north central Texas. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately.
